messages.content: How do I install the ComfyUI_API_Manager nodes?
Clone the repository into your `custom_nodes` directory. No external dependencies are required.
What are the input fields of the API Request Node?
How do I use the Text Prompt Combiner Node?
Insert API response data into a text box and use `$attributeName` syntax to insert values.
What are the required inputs for the Image Post Node?
An image, an object ID as a string, and an API key.
Can I customize the nodes to meet my workflow needs?
Yes, the nodes can be adjusted or extended based on specific workflow requirements.
How can I contribute to the ComfyUI_API_Manager package?
Submit a pull request or open an issue to report improvements or bug fixes.
